msbt.message: points. Rank . Congratulations! This time your home scored 10,000 points or more, so we're sending along a commemorative gift. Hope you like it!
points. Rank . Wow! Your home topped the 20,000-point mark! That's cause for celebrationâ€”and a special gift from the HHA.
points. Rank . You're getting quite good at this! You just topped 30,000 points, so we're sending along a little something special. Congrats!
points. Rank . Wow! 50,000 points is nothing to sneeze at. Congrats on hitting the mark, and please accept this small token of our appreciation.
points. Rank . The 70,000-points milestone is something to remember! Congrats! Please accept this small token of our appreciation and admiration.
points. Rank . Six digits! You've done it! On the occasion of earning a score above 100,000 points, please accept our congratulations and this special gift.
points. Rank . Wow. We're in awe of your score above 150,000 points. At this point, you should probably be rating US. Please accept this gift and our hearty congratulations.
